import React,{useState}from'react';import styles from'./RegisterForm.module.css';// Importando o CSS corretamente
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RegisterForm(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleRegister=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/register',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,email,password})});const data=await res.json();if(res.ok){alert('Cadastro feito com sucesso!');}else{alert(data.error);}}catch(err){console.error('Erro ao registrar:',err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.container,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleRegister,className:styles.form,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:styles.title,children:"Cadastro"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nome de usu\xE1rio",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true,className:styles.input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,className:styles.input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Senha",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,className:styles.input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:styles.button,children:"Cadastrar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:styles.linkText,children:["J\xE1 tem uma conta?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/login",className:styles.link,children:"Fazer login"})]})]})});}export default RegisterForm;
